description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the French Revolution, and of the wars produced by that ... event ..., including a complete account of the war between Great Britain and America; and the ... Battle of Waterloo. To which are appended, biographical sketches of the heroes of Waterloo ... With engravings and ... maps" Author: Kelly, Christopher. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9525.f.1." Volume: 02 Page: 10 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1820 Publisher: T. Kelly Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001944212 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
